name: Phil: Foliage Finder
description:
The game takes a while to load upon starting, please give it some time.

The town of Damswell, a naturally dead and plant-hostile environment in Southern California, has been overrun with mutant weeds called the Scrunklies! Unfortunately, all the landscapers are all out of town and the weed insurrection is only growing worse. Its up to Phil, a struggling metalsmith, to take his tools of metal destruction and head to each backyard and stop these menaces.

Featuring...

  • 25 unique waves of enemies
  • Beautifully animated characters
  • Three different unlockable weapon customizations
  • and different powerups

Can you save the city of Damswell from becoming a modern recreation of a city in ruin?

Controls-
WASD / arrow keys to move around
LMB - shoot
Q - change your current tool
